page.title: 05TRADE ETRURIA NISSAN GARAGE.
page.content: Opposite the 1986 Garden Festival site in Etruria is the Nissan Garage. Opened on the 4th of January 1985 it is the most modern of its type in the Potteries.Our small school group visited it on the 5th of June 1985. The maanager gave us a tour of all the buildings.We started outside where the new cars,brought by transporter from the docks,were kept.They went inside the cleaning bay and then to the mechanics room to be checked.The place where the cars are serviced and repaired is very roomy with all the latest equipment.A special paint mixing room and a low bake oven were very interesting.After a snack in the canteen we went to see the stores.Then we visited the offices and last of all used the computer to find out about cars and prices all over the country.
